title: Bug 44408ELexpression evaluation slow due to synchronization caused by JspFactory.getDefaultFactory
description: Bug 44408ELexpression evaluation slow due to synchronization caused by JspFactory.getDefaultFactory
OB: Tomcat version 6.0.16 trunk (and earlier)PageContextImpl.java has:public static Object proprietaryEvaluate()that does a:final ExpressionFactory exprFactory = JspFactory.getDefaultFactory().getJspApplicationContext(pageContext.getServletContext()).getExpressionFactory();Our benchmarking of pages using large amounts of ELexpression shows this turnsinto a bottleneck due to the fact that JspFactory.getDefaultFactory() issynchronized.The bug is very similar to bug 41558I have a patch that fixes the issue, coming up...
